modName: Automatic Main Menu - More Wallpapers HD and Songs
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]gt4qrrl9ZEE[/youtube] [youtube]H-oQc4HFyl8[/youtube][/center]
[center][img]http://www.al-partners.com/images/ita.gif[/img] Per la guida in italiano della mod andate [url=http://modskyrimpictures.altervista.org/automatic-main-menu-wallpapers/]QUA[/url]
[color=black][/color][color=black][size=2]<------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->[/size][/color]
[color=yellow][size=4]This mod replace the main-menu with various Wallpapers and Songs[/size][/color]
[color=black][size=2]<------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->[/size][/color][/center]

[color=#ff7700][size=5]Requirement[/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2]skyrim 1.9.32.0.. (update13)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]plugin [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] version 1.7.1 or later[/size][/*]
[/list]


[size=6][color=#ff7700]Installation[/color]
[list][*][color=#f4f4f4]Extract the contents of the zipped file into your Skyrim/folder [overwriting if Necessary][/color]
[/*][*][color=#f4f4f4]Now Launch Skyrim by [/color][color=#1e84cc][size=3]SKSE_loader[/size][/color][color=#f4f4f4] to change the wallpaper and music at every boot![/color]
[/*][/list][/size][color=navy]___________________________________________________________________________________[/color]
[size=4]Audio[/size]: if by chance the volume is low edit SkyrimPrefs.ini in [Document / My Games / Skyrim]
open with Notepad and change the string:

[AudioMenu]
fAudioMasterVolume=1.0000

in

[AudioMenu]
fAudioMasterVolume=2.0000 

or

[AudioMenu]
fAudioMasterVolume=4.0000

Save and Enjoy :D
------------------------



[color=#ff7700][size=6]Main Files and optional[/size][/color]

[color=yellow][size=3]WallPapers HD and Songs[/size][/color] : adds 40 wallpapers HD and 40 Songs 
[color=green][size=3]WallPapers and Songs eXtra[/size][/color] : adds 9 wallpapers HD and 9 Songs 
[color=aqua][size=3]WallPapers RAGONBORN EDITION[/size][/color] : adds 8 wallpapers HD and 8 Songs 

[color=#999999][size=3]fog remover[/size][/color] : removes "FOG" from loading-screen and main-menu

[color=gray][size=3]ONLY Wallpapers HD [/size][/color]: adds Only 57 Wallpapers in hight definition (no songs)
[color=gray][size=3]ONLY Wallpapers Lq [/size][/color] : adds Only 57 Wallpapers il low quality for low-pc (no songs)



[color=#ff7700][size=6]compatible mods
[/size][/color][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M-Uqxq9DZSU]Load Screen Fan-Art[/url] [Loading-mod]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8023]No Bethesda Logo In Menu
[/url][size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/100]KenMOD - Skip Bethesda intro
[/url][/size][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25104]Automatic Main Menu - New Logos 3D and Songs
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3708/?]main menu wallpaper replacer HD with randomizer[/url]
